resources.string: Good morning!\nHope you have a good day!
Good afternoon!\nHope you\'re having a good day so far!
Good evening!\nHope you had a good day!
You\'ve been feeling a little down lately. Don\'t worry, it\'ll pass soon!
This last week could\'ve gone better, but it also could\'ve been worse. Try making more time for things you enjoy!
You\'ve been feeling pretty good lately!
You could use some rest. Be sure to take time this week to sleep!
You\'re not quite getting the hours of sleep you need. Consider getting more rest to stay at your peak performance!
You\'re getting a pretty good amount of sleep!
